original_title: Cadde la notte su di me
overview: After a night at the club, a man tries to enter his car but is blocked by the software running it, because of his alcohol level. The man and the car discuss like a couple until his physical and verbal violence grows unexpectedly. An allegory for gender violence, by representing the distorted vision of a possessive man in a sci-fi tone.
title: Cadde la notte su di me
